articles.author: Megan Marples, CNN
articles.title: How to update your medical record so it includes your Covid-19 vaccination - CNN
articles.description: Many Americans received their Covid-19 vaccines at drive-ins or pop-up community events. In many cases, those vaccination records aren't added to your official medical record. Here's how to make sure your immunization record is included.

articles.author: Paige Freshwater
articles.title: When to catch a glimpse of the Pink Moon above northern Lincolnshire - Grimsby Live
articles.description: Northern Native Americans call the April full moon the Pink Moon after a species of early blooming wildflowers
articles.content:
A rare Pink Moon is set to brighten the night sky early tomorrow morning. 
Stargazers in Grimsby, Cleethorpesand Scunthorpecan catch the spectacular sight on on Tuesday, April 27 at 4.31am.
